material_no, material_code, barcode_ean, material_name, specifications, old_code, inventory_category, material_source, tax_rate_no, tax_category, size_type_no, allow_sale, allow_delegate, allow_purchase, allow_produce, material_status, a.enable_flag, code_rule_no, advice_price, currency_no, season_no, a.category_no, model_no, style_no, product_code, manufacturer, brand_no, development_times, outer_bottom, style, sales_channels, vamp_material, color_no, gender_type, series, join_order_metting, textures, normal_unit,category_name,unit_name ,if_qc
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) as s FROM bas_material WHERE 1=1

select size_type_no, max(if(order_no='1',size_name,'0')) AS f1, max(if(order_no='2',size_name,'0')) AS f2, max(if(order_no='3',size_name,0)) AS f3, max(if(order_no='4',size_name,0)) AS f4, max(if(order_no='5',size_name,0)) AS f5, max(if(order_no='6',size_name,0)) AS f6, max(if(order_no='7',size_name,0)) AS f7, max(if(order_no='8',size_name,0)) AS f8, max(if(order_no='9',size_name,0)) AS f9, max(if(order_no='10',size_name,0)) AS f10, max(if(order_no='11',size_name,0)) AS f11, max(if(order_no='12',size_name,0)) AS f12, max(if(order_no='13',size_name,0)) AS f13, max(if(order_no='14',size_name,0)) AS f14, max(if(order_no='15',size_name,0)) AS f15, max(if(order_no='16',size_name,0)) AS f16, max(if(order_no='17',size_name,0)) AS f17, max(if(order_no='18',size_name,0)) AS f18, max(if(order_no='19',size_name,0)) AS f19, max(if(order_no='20',size_name,0)) AS f20 from bas_size where 1=1
and size_type_no in(${sizeTypeNo})
and size_type_no in (select size_type_no from bas_material where material_no in(${materialNo}))
group by size_type_no

mapper.update:
UPDATE bas_material
material_code = #{materialCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
barcode_ean = #{barcodeEan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
material_name = #{materialName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
specifications = #{specifications,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
old_code = #{oldCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inventory_category = #{inventoryCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
material_source = #{materialSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tax_rate_no = #{taxRateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tax_category = #{taxCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
size_type_no = #{sizeTypeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
allow_sale = #{allowSale,jdbcType=TINYINT},
allow_delegate = #{allowDelegate,jdbcType=TINYINT},
allow_purchase = #{allowPurchase,jdbcType=TINYINT},
allow_produce = #{allowProduce,jdbcType=TINYINT},
material_status = #{materialStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
enable_flag = #{enableFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
code_rule_no = #{codeRuleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
advice_price = #{advicePrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
currency_no = #{currencyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
season_no = #{seasonNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
category_no = #{categoryNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
model_no = #{modelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
style_no = #{styleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_code = #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
manufacturer = #{manufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brand_no = #{brandNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
development_times = #{developmentTimes,jdbcType=TINYINT},
outer_bottom = #{outerBottom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
style = #{style,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sales_channels = #{salesChannels,jdbcType=TINYINT},
vamp_material = #{vampMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
color_no = #{colorNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender_type = #{genderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
series = #{series,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
join_order_metting = #{joinOrderMetting,jdbcType=TINYINT},
textures = #{textures,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
normal_unit = #{normalUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
material_type = #{materialType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
if_qc = #{ifQc,jdbcType=TINYINT},
WHERE material_no = #{materialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
